item.title: EP 28 - Hot Wings
item.itunes:title: Hot Wings
item.description:
Today we DON'T EAT HONEY SMACKS! STOP EATING THEM NOW!

Patreon 

https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

MERCH STORE!!!
https://tinyurl.com/y8zam4o2

Sorry, had to get that warning out first. Today we learn about cereal killers, staying cool next to the Sun, and look into the conspiracy theory that Anthony Bourdain was killed by Hillary Clinton

Honey Smacks, the cereal with that looks like cardboard shaped nuggets covered in glaze, has sickened 100 people across multiple states. Seriously, throw your box away and grab some Frosted Flakes instead. I heard thhhheeeeyyyyy'rrrrreeee pretty good.

Next, we travel past Mercury and fly humanity's first probe into the face of the sun. But we still can't prove the world is round? Sounds fishy to me.

Finally, we look at the tragic death of Anthony Bourdain and the conspiracy that 1) His girlfriend Asia Argento is next, 2) He was murdered due to the #MeToo campaign, 3) Hillary Clinton played a role in his death and 4)Sometimes, reality is more depressing than the conspiracy theories we make up to comfort us and create order in a mad, mad world.

 

Links:

https://suicidepreventionlifeline.org

1-800-273-8255

Do Not Eat Honey Smacks,' CDC Warns

https://patch.com/oregon/across-or/do-not-eat-honey-smacks-cdc-warns

NASA readies probe to touch the sun with 'cutting-edge heat shield' "It's getting hot in here, so protect all your probes."

https://www.cnet.com/news/nasa-readies-probe-to-touch-the-sun-with-cutting-edge-heat-shield/

Bombshell Bourdain interview is published one month after his suicide: Celebrity chef unloads on 'rapey, gropey and disgusting Bill Clinton and hopes Weinstein is 'beaten to death in jail'

http://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-5957551/Anthony-Bourdain-spoke-Clinton-Weinstein-one-final-interviews.html

Alt. Gossip Celebrities Blind item Rehash

http://www.agcwebpages.com/BLINDITEMS/2018/JUNE.html

Top advisor from Clinton '08 campaign reportedly accused of sexual harassment, protected by Clinton

https://www.cnbc.com/2018/01/26/clinton-declined-to-fire-faith-advisor-accused-of-harassment-in-2008.html

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

------------------------------------------------

Logo Art By Ash Black
Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"
Closing Song: "Bella Royale"
Music By Dr. Huxxxtable
Hood River

http://www.DeadRabbit.com

Email: DeadRabbitRadio@gmail.com

Twitter: @DeadRabbitRadio

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/DeadRabbitRadio

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.

All Contents Of This Podcast Copyright Jason Carpenter 2018 - 2020
